attributes.action: MP David Lammy should be sacked immediately.
attributes.background: Labour MP David Lammy has shown his contempt for political process and democracy by suggesting that parliament disregards the will of the people and ignores the result of the EU referendum. He should be removed from his position as an MP as he is unfit to represent any political office.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
